website_summaries.verdict: An accurate baitcaster, though its gears will need lubricating after several casts.
pros: Works well with different types of line
Casts long and accurately, with a low profile
cons: Reels can develop a grinding noise after several uses
Backlash is an issue for some users

customer_reviews.title: I'm just so happy with this reel
customer_reviews.text: I go fishing a few times a week, and was looking for another reel to have another baitcaster setup. I currently have 2 Abu Garcia BlackMax 6.4:1 reels and some spinning setups, but was looking at trying something different. Between the high rating and the price, I thought I'd give this a try. The KastKing was not only $20+ cheaper, but also outperforms the Abu Garcias on every level - Less backlashes, smoother reeling, further casting distances. I'm just so happy with this reel, and can't wait to try out some of the other ones and ratios from KastKing.
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustPauly

customer_reviews.title: Quality reel, affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, smooth retrieve, reliable controls. You won't be sorry buying this reel. I had a couple cheap baitcast rigs when I was a teenager and was never impressed with them. A friend recommended I get a better reel and try again. This reel was suggested. It has made me a believer. The controls on this reel are fantastic. Spool resistance adjustment requires little tuning to get results, the drag and retrieve controls are metal, the handle is cushioned and grips well. I can get it setup with free fall drops and 9/10 times that's perfect for casting. Once you're dialed in, you can throw your bait a long ways.
customer_reviews.author: B.T.S.Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: OLD: The whitemax is an awesome low-profile baitcaster with a sleek design. Drags nice and smooth and it has more line capacity than the other KastKing baitcasters. Got mine spooled up with 30lb superkast9 braid. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a lower gear ratio baitcaster NEW: This reel lasted for approximately 5 trips of casting out 2oz lured and pieces of bait. The drag became stuttery/locked-up consistently and the gears started making crunching noises.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin-scott "Catterman" van Vlijmen

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST reel that I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST reel that I have ever used. I have bought two additional reels, and each has performed equally well. It is smooth as silk. and I would compare this with top of the line reels from Shimano, Abu Garcia, Lews, and others. I've used both flurocarbon and braid on this reel,...both worked very well. The first time I had it out fishing, I caught a 7+ lb bass, and it worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Newman

customer_reviews.title: ... in February and right out the packaging it looked nice.. I spooled it 17lb line and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel in February and right out the packaging it looked nice..I spooled it 17lb line and the first cast it sounded dry and cheap. I thought may it needs lubricant but that didn’t work. So bout a month later I picked it up again and tried it out. It worked perfect. I took it to the lake a couple of time and caught a couple of fish on it. So I thought I just had to work it in. Not the case this past weekend I couldn’t even fish with it. It only cast about 10 yards while making a dry sound. I wouldn’t buy this product again because I can’t get in touch with the company
customer_reviews.author: Damion A. Dews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer support!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first KaskKing reals one year ago. The quality was great. I recently purchased two more, and they design had changed, and the quality was not good. Both reals became unusable after one freshwater outing. However, I simply contacted KastKing and they sent me a return package and two new replacement reals. I was very impressed. I assume I just received a bad run on the initial order. Hopefully these will prove better quality. I will follow up if they do not hold up. Given my experience, I would not hesitate to give them a try. For the cost they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: plusco

customer_reviews.title: Thumb release does not stay released
customer_reviews.text: The thumb release works half of the time and requires to be pressed down very hard for it to actually stay released. Sometimes no matter how hard you press down the thumb release will not stay released and will catch in mid air while you are casting. Going back to using my 20 year old Abu Garcia that unfortunately works better than this new reel.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great reel !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 21 yr old son for his birthday. He's still a beginner with a baitcaster but he's doing great with this reel. Most reels in this price range have horrible brake systems. This one breaks that rule. It cast smooth and long. It's quiet and light. It's small enough to easily fit in your palm. I was reading online that this reel and it's black colored counterpart are rated as the 3rd best reel under $100. I agree with that. Personally, I've been using Shimano Curado reels for over 20 yrs. This compares favorably to them. I'd have no qualms at all about using this reel exclusively. Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Rakita

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive....but not cheap!
customer_reviews.text: First of all...I love the price. As a newbie for baitcast reels, I have been reluctant in purchasing any. Your price made it a doable thing for an unknown. Altho I have not had the chance to get in the water with it, I have been trying to tune it for backlashes so I will be ready to take it out....probably within the week. It does have a low profile and feels good in my hand...and I really like the left hand retrieve option in a reel so inexpensive. Thanx for pricing this reel so that it can become part of my fishing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Blake

customer_reviews.title: so far, excellent reel
customer_reviews.text: ordered/rec'd two of these reels. sturdy packaging, thorough instructions, and stylist product. matched the reels to 7' bait-casting rod by KastKing - nice pairing. smooth action on release, solid feel and response on strikes. my hope is i get 3 to 5 years out of these reels. also, the reels came with survey monkey cards indicating promotional braided line however KK requires an order number other than amazon's thus preventing one from completing the survey and obtaining (in my case 2) the braided line spool(s).
customer_reviews.author: axmsw

customer_reviews.title: Surprised I like baitcasters!
customer_reviews.text: I've used spinning reels my whole life and this is my 2nd baitcaster. My first one which cost twice as much as this one was nothing but an aggravation. I decided to give them another shot and ordered this one. After a few trips I love this reel. It's easy to use and easy to adjust. I couldnt be happier! I've had a few birds nests at first but that's 100% on me learning how to use a baitcaster. I love how quickly and precisely I can control my casts. I'm right handed and I ordered a left handed reel just because that's what I'm used to with my spinner reels.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: They just know how to take care of customers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel 6 months ago and the thumb bar started to crack just recently. I let Kastking know and they sent me a brand new replacement reel because they just know how to take care of customers! Great warranty! Great customer service! I love this reel too much it was my 1st baitcaster going into as a beginner and now I have different types of baitcasters and I still love using this one over my shimanos, quantums, abu garcias, etc... It cast very smooth and the braking system is top of the line! For the price I would recommend this to anyone who wants to get into baitcasters!
customer_reviews.author: The angry customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, never got off a decent cast
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a great buy, got it setup on my rod and finally got a nice day to go fishing but never got off a cast. Had everything dialed in but every cast the rod would get helacious bird nests, a few times if the lure made it 10 feet out I would try to reel in and the line would be feeding backwards as I reeled. My first thought was I did something wrong but I've used this type of reel for years and even got the factory papers back out to make sure everything was right.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet baitcaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good starter and your unsure you want to commit to the baitcaster way of life, this is for you. Smooth, cast well, looks good, sounds good, nice price and a good value. I personally recommend you engage (1) set of the interior brakes, (make sure which ever ones you do, they are across from each other, otherwise not balanced) set your magnetics to mid, tighten the spool tension til whatever weight bait your using, falls at a slow speed but does fall. get used to that, as you gain experience and thumb control, go ahead and throw caution to the wind and loosen that spool tension a bit and chunk and crank, enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers_the_Wise

customer_reviews.title: Horrible - reels hangs when reeling in line.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered reel and got a chance to put it on a new rod. First fishing trip, it developed a catch or hang when reeling in line. It is like a bad place in the gear, but has gotten worse and worse where it is unusable now. Unfortunately it is past the 30-day Amazon return.
customer_reviews.author: mkhunt

customer_reviews.title: Kast King is King
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the reels from Kast King is the affordability with features of lager more expensive bait casters. I like to use my reel in my right hand to cast because I'm using spinning reels also to fish. Kast King offers the reels in both left and right hand casting for the same price. Amazon got it to me in 2 days since it was in stock and not on back order. I still have to spool the reel and get it to the river, but I don't think that will be a problem at all. I'm sure this reel will work just as fallible as the other Kast King reels I have.
customer_reviews.author: metrocopper

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these original version reels and 2 of the royal legend2s. I am really pleased with all 4. The version 2 is a little more comfortable in the hand and I like them just a bit more than this original but they are almost identical as far as use. This original version has more bearings 11+1 vs 5+1 and it also has centrifugal breaking with 4 different settings which is better for beginners. I am very pleased with all 4 reels. Also worth adding is I had a Spartacus version of this brand which cost $30 more and didn't like it so I sent it back and got this reel witch I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Montgomeryyy

customer_reviews.title: Made it through 3/4's of the day then started making a weird noise like a bearing was going out
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use the reel this weekend. Made it through 3/4's of the day then started making a weird noise like a bearing was going out. Started out great and I though it was a great reel. Was very smooth and cast great. But now it only casts like 10 yds with 1/2oz spinnerbait and sounds like it's full of rocks. I'll try to take it apart soon and see what the issue is. Hopefully it's just a bearing and I can salvage it with an IBEC ceramic. Drag works great, and reels in very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nathen Barto

customer_reviews.title: This real got so many great reviews I had to get one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second casting reel, I purchased my first 30 years ago and after a day of backlash swore I would never buy another. This real got so many great reviews I had to get one. Possibly impossible to tangle line, I love this real fits perfect in my hand the white with red drag looks great. I am so pleased with the purchase. For a full review check out Spartan kid outdoors on Youtube and buy one of these. Happy Fishing
customer_reviews.author: Dtancr

customer_reviews.title: Good reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just received and took it out for a couple hours fishing. Nice reel for the money. Smooth cast and retrieve. Watched a KastKing youtube video on baitcast reel setup and no birds nests for the first time using a bait cast reel. So far very pleased with the purchase and would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice variation on the Royal Legend!
customer_reviews.text: Been fishing with this for a couple weeks now, I used it to build a mid-column/finesse pole for bass to throw chatter baits, crank baits, and various bottom rigs. I like how the handle grips get real thin in the middle because my finger and thumb feel pretty comfortable on them. I have a Royal Legend II as well so the feel is still really familiar but offering enough change in the grip to make it distinct and easy to distinguish between poles with the different colorway. And just like the RLII, I think there's awesome value for the money on these reels - they feel solid and smooth and most importantly they reel fish in!
customer_reviews.author: Carson W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Braking System for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was my first bait casting reel, so it had to be super easy to learn and prevent the dreaded birds nest. I had purchased a different brand but returned it because I could not get the brake to work. This reel had a much better braking system and I was soon casting like my old spin cast reel. It did take a little time to understand the magnetic clutch and how to adjust it correctly after I started learning how much pressure to use with my thumb. This was so easy, I purchased the Royal Legend as well. Very pleased with my purchase and I would recommend this reel to any beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: royal legend GR by kastking
customer_reviews.text: Received my reel today. It arrived quickly, packaging and reel were in good condition. Waiting for line to spool it up. The crank is smooth and the reel feels solid, but not too heavy. Looking forward to trying this out, and practicing my casting! I ordered a KastKing Crixus rod to pair with this and look forward to fishing with this combination. It seems the 'free braided line' for answering the survey is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: PattyZ

customer_reviews.title: Good to get into baitcasting.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cheap reel if you're like me and trying baitcasting for the first time. It performs better than any $40 reel I'm sure, but after using it about a month I'm ready to upgrade. This isn't A reel that's worth 2-3 times what you pay, keep that in mind. The handle has a lot of play, it's big and plastic and cheap feeling, it's rough reeling sometimes (cheap lube I'm sure), and backlashes or casts 20 feet. If you're picky and NEED higher performing equipment to feel like you have a chance, you actually have to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: So smooth
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was how light it is. I like how it's easy to handle and lightweight, I also love how I can tighten or loosen the pull. It's a very cool feature. I've never had something like this, I am very impressed. Overall love the color, the feel and the features. Great value as well. Just get it you'll be doing yourself a favor. I already talked my brother into getting one. We need it for every pole.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first casting reel and I'm really satisfied with the purchase. Gears and bearings seem to be super smooth and overall fit and finish is excellent. I've only been able to take it out in the backyard to test it out, but I've been able to cast it pretty well without birds nesting it. Can't wait to get it out on the water. I was going to ding it one star for the composite body, but at this price point I really can't. Seems to be a great reel.
customer_reviews.author: Alakar

customer_reviews.title: Worth it ...
customer_reviews.text: Update 8/2020: having some issues with the retrieve this year ... jerks like something is wrong internally after sitting over the winter. Too bad ... but still works great so long as I don't try to adjust anything. Good for beginners, but seems to be made to last. I took this our of the box and immediately did some sport fishing for walleye, northern Pike and this reel did not disappoint. Seems a little small compared to more expensive reels, but performed very well in the first few outings. Worth taking a chance, for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Y

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Reel!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever bait caster and so far it's been great! The online instructions are easy to understand and I've been able to cast most of the time with little issues or effort. Its been a fun time using this reel and I've received quite a few comments on my setup and how it looks expensive. Great value and strongly recommend this reel for anyone needing a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cgot

customer_reviews.title: VERY FORGIVING SPOOL FOR VIRTUALLY NO BACKLASH!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth casting, VERY FORGIVING!!, Little to no adjustments when switching from weighted 2oz swimbaits to weightless senkos! I will DEFINITELY be buying more Kastking Reels! Youtube has a plethora of videos trying to get these reels to blacklash, as well as Kastking's own PR videos. Did I mention it can launch anything a mile? I mean it, ANYTHING! I throw small 3-6 inch finesse plastics up to Savage Gear glidebaits and it just doesnt care, it will launch!
customer_reviews.author: Rio Sandate

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel as my swim bait, light crankbait reel. The first one broke as soon as there was any resistance put to the line with a studder in the crank. The second was sent wrong handed. The third worked well for about 3 weeks and then broke the same as the first. I bought this to replace the broken Brutus KastKing reel I had that only lasted 4 months. KastKing says they back their reels up to a year well I have 3 they can have.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe it
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that a reel that I paid $39.99 for is this good! With all of the Chinese brands out there for the same price I was very skeptical. I did some research and the reason this reel is rated so high for the price is because kastking does not out their stuff in big box stores, they are direct to the consumer so they can sale high quality for a lower price. This reel is as smooth as my lews reel and the quality is parallel. I will be switching everything over to kastking in the future. Amazing reel!!! Let this review set your mind at ease that you are getting a quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Worth every PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!!! I gave this to my husband for fathers day 2018, and he has not stopped talking about it. Went out yesterday and racked up 32 brims with it. The manual/brochure was spot on. It made everything about the reel seem like he had an expensive, too of the line reel. He keeps talking about how smooth it is to cast and how far it gets. Wherever the perfect spot is, this reel is the one for that spot.. Let me also add, that this is one of the most beautiful reels I have ever seen, great price and certainly worth every penny. I will be getting him only Kast King products from now on...
customer_reviews.author: hotty toddy rebel

customer_reviews.title: Kastking
customer_reviews.text: Played with this thing all day yesterday. NOT IMPRESSED. Its very loud when reeling in and numerous birds nest through out the day. I ended up putting away and using my Black Max.
customer_reviews.author: Scott04171973

customer_reviews.title: First Baitcasting Reel
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to learn a new skill and figured I'd jump in to bait casting reel! This reel was easy to set up, (watched like a hundred YouTube videos), and started casting into buckets the back yard. Had it down in about 3 hours. I'd start out with 8 pound monofilament, and use electricians tape to wrap your line after you've pulled about 30 yards out, this way you don't have much of a bird's nest to sort through. I've pretty much abused this reel over the past two months. Nice beginner reel!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Campy

customer_reviews.title: Just a great reel!
customer_reviews.text: I had a bit of experience with baitcasters and I thought I'd try this out due to the reviews and the price. I have been really happy with this purchase....I live in the Galveston area and I can use this reel for bass or for some inshore fishing for flounder/reds/specks.....this reel is super smooth and casts far once you get it set up correctly.....I'm telling you....this is a great reel for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic products
customer_reviews.text: I used to work at the biggest fishing store. Know all the major brands and how much they really are worth and how good they really are. Kastking has come to the market making an affordable product that has created a new genre in fishing. The cost and origin makes most people sneer at it. Well as usual the snobs are stupid. Talking without research or knowledge. I've spent the high money. It just doesn't make sense anymore. Kastking is moving forward with innovation and quality. The Royal legend is a great baitcaster in both function and performance. Please, please fight the stupids and treat yourself to this reel. A winning combo: Amazon and Kastking
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Gregory

customer_reviews.title: best reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baitcaster, but I have had other Kastking products and they are some of the best on the market for the price. So far it has worked great! all the right features, seems durable, lightweight enough, and casts smooth. Favorite thing about it is the ease of set up for a beginner. Having the two types of breaking systems help set up for a beginner, I think. Great product for the price! Good job Kastking.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fife

customer_reviews.title: Great Reels at great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Wednesday and arrived today (Friday) Loaded with fluorcarbon and casts real smooth. I have four other KastKing reels and I expect this one will perform as well as the others. Two of those are Royal Legends so basically the same reel. Have been replacing my old AbuGarcia reels from the 80’s and 90’s to get smaller and faster ratio reels at a great price. So far they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Reid

customer_reviews.title: I love this company
customer_reviews.text: Originally heard about it from extremephillyfishing. I needed a new bait caster, and this one holds up. It was a little dry when I got it though, so I oiled the bearings a little. Feels great casts pretty nice. Fights the fish well, and it has a great profile. Got it on a 7,2 uglystick and the colors match perfectly. Not too big on that but it's cool. Just a great reel. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel, felt like a Pro!
customer_reviews.text: Used this reel yesterday catching some nice Florida bass and I'm ready to buy another.... This is my third KastKing product (spinning reel/rod and sunglasses), figured it was a safe bet. I've been out of the fishing game for a while and needed something decent. Picked this up at a good price to see how my bait casting skills were and man, it was easy with this joker. No kidding.... Just jump on Youtube and learn the settings and you'll be good to go. So much better than a Zebco 33 lol I see myself having a collection of most KastKings... Buy it....
customer_reviews.author: SailingandSuch

customer_reviews.title: Reel isnt as smooth as i thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel with high expectations. Reviews and other models i saw looked promising. It does cast very well and feels great not too heavy or bulky. Now what i dont like is when i retrieve it sticks a bit. Now it doesnt every time but enough to where its annoying. I notice it only on slow retrieves if i go a bit faster dont notice it. I will update if i decided to exchange it for a properly working one. So far i love everything else about it and if mine is the rare broken one i will be buying plenty more.
customer_reviews.author: Vanisher187

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Baitcasting Fishing Reel At A Reasonable Price!
customer_reviews.text: This reel is very good value: High quality for a decent price. It is ergonomic and feels lightweight, yet is strong enough to reel in the big ones! It is aesthetically pleasing as well. There are many lower end reels on the market, but you won't find the quality that this KastKing Royale Legend Whitemax offers. We were so happy with this reel, we bought a 2nd one to add to our fishing gear! We would have no problem recommending this reel to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Schott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent step up from big box store selection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 yr old daughters to use. Learning curve was about 5 casts. Loading the reel was easy with the help of a youtube video, and tension adjustments are easy. Loaded with 6 lb mono, casting and retrieval is nice. Retrieval ratio was nice and helped the kids quite a bit. For the price, this reel is a very considerable upgrade from what’s available at Wally’s World. I purchased during a lightning round deal, and would likely purchase another one if I see it on sale again. Would it hesitate for anyone looking for an above entry-level bait caster.
customer_reviews.author: gkat

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel thus far!!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet, my 2nd baitcaster but the first I have actually kept in my arsenal. I just have to figure out how to keep my casted line from digging into the line at the spool when I latch on to a fish that is really fighting. For example, when I go to make the next cast after I release the previous big fish, the line will only go 11-12ft then stop abruptly. I am using braid so I may have to switch it for mono.
customer_reviews.author: PrynceAl

customer_reviews.title: Reel doesn't maintain spool tension which caused a lot of backlashes
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this model and getting the Royal Legend Elite Series instead. I'm banking on the Elite having a better braking system and the spool tension adjustment. I was pretty frustrated with this model. Update, after two months I am very happy with the Royal Legend Elite series, it is worth the difference in price.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Harbin

customer_reviews.title: This reel is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This reel is a waste of money. I've attempted to use it three different times and it's going in the trash since I'm past the return period. I'm experienced with baitcasters and use them on a regular basis. This reel constantly creates a bird's nest regardless of how the brake is set. I've tried a couple of different types of line with the same results. When it's not in a tangled mess, it'll cast out about 30 feet and the brake grabs and stops the line from going any further. Spend a few more bucks and get one from a known company.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good reel
customer_reviews.text: This reel is a bit complicated to use at first, but once you get the hang of it its a really good reel for its price. with spinning reels, you can skimp on quality because it will perform about the same. a good quality baitcaster reel will definitely outperform the majority of spinning reels. this reel definitely fits in the higher quality category for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning and ever better after.
customer_reviews.text: I had only ever cast with spinning reels previously. I bought this based on YouTube videos showing that even with zero thumbing technique you can cast with out back lash. 100% agree!!! I have taught myself quite quickly how to cast over hand, side arm, and under hand flick in approximately 5 trips out. It handles very well. I've been able to cast my 3/8's lure over 40 yards using a Shakespeare ugly stick pole. So far I've used spoons, swim baits, jigs, and rooster tails. All cast very well after making the adjustments to tension knob and brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Uno707

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: As most everyone has already pointed out, this is a great real for the money. Looks sharp and is easy to set up. However there is one thing I find a little annoying: fine tuning the spool tensioner knob is tricky for me. The knobs on most other reels I have "click" when I turn it, making it easier to fine tune my adjustments when I change baits. Nothing huge, but I do notice it when I'm trying to make quick adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel and awesome customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: 6/28/18. Customer service got ahold of me and let me know that the cover was a promotional item, which is why I didn't get it. They said they sent me one anyways though which is wicked awesome. Used the reel and it performs flawlessly!! Didn't receive the black cover with the reel. Looks like it came in decent shape. Really sharp looking reel and based on the other reviews it performs amazingly. Pumped to use it and will update review once I do. 2 star review based on not getting cover as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: justin sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased reel for my son and he loves it. Very easy to cast and very smooth. I paired the reel with a Lews rod and it was a very good combo for Texas rigs and flukes. Asked several people about kastking before I purchased the reel and they have never heard of them. I've shown them the reel and the cast it and they are very impressed with the quality. I will be purchasing more in the future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as butter , AG blackmax killer
customer_reviews.text: Just switched my two Abu Garcia black Max's to a whitemax and a stealth, this is my 4th kast king I also own their Sharkey 3 baitfeeder and a summer 3000 , kastking really does make some of the best reels and the white max looks amazing cast a mile and is a smooth as can be , it puts my blackmax to shame and I though those reels were amazing Kastking will be the only reels I buy in the future you can't go wrong with them .
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Price and performance sold me on this Kastking name. Affordable Innovation, for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a baitcasting reel before this one. I had my doubts after using spinning reels my whole life, I’m almost 50. Baitcasters seemed so complicated. After properly spooling the line, 10#, (did you know there’s a proper method?!) and reading the instructions (rtfm), which come in the box, unlike some, I set the drag, adjusted the tension and adjusted the brakes. Fished the next day. Two or three rough casts and then butter. The Kastking Royale Legend GT outperformed my spinning reels (and another brand I bought to test). Even caught fish. Overall, a great baitcaster for a great price. They even throw a decal in the box, that’s pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great quality reel
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel so much that I purchased a second. Ease of use after reviewing some tutorials on technique. Let me tell you it is a practice thing just adjusting your mindset to this type of reel. Now it is my favorite style. The key is changing the way you think to open up a whole new way to fish. This is not a spin casting reel.
customer_reviews.author: Klunker

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was extremely fast. 3 days with no prime membership. A lot of people said it was hard to dial in but I think they just don’t know how to use a baitcaster. Had it perfect after the first cast. No backlashes yet, very smooth, nice drag. Paired it with a Lews 7 foot MH fast action rod and 40 lb braid. Seems to be holding up nicely so far. I was a bit hesitant at first when buying because of the price point but even if it only lasts 2 years then it is still a good deal. If you’re on the fence about it then just buy it and try it out. You won’t be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Master

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I have had two other bait casters. A Lot of cursing and frustration came with them. They found themselves in the trash very soon. My KastKing however is very easy to cast no serious bird nests yet after casting over 100 times. Learned proper set up for delivery and now it's fairly simple. Great deal easy to set up and easy to adjust to the proper lure weight. Little to no more stress ya hoo.
customer_reviews.author: Gary johnson

customer_reviews.title: High dollar quality, at budget price
customer_reviews.text: The features and function of the KastKing is directly on par with by far more expensive reels. I have learned to use baitcasters with many different features. All have been frustrating and difficult. I have not experienced the endless bird nesting of other, I think mainly due to the braking system. I am very impressed. It is one of my go-to reels at every angling event.
customer_reviews.author: TXDiver

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth reel
customer_reviews.text: I had been spending a few bucks on the cheaper Chineese reels thinking that the Kast Kings wouldn't been much better for the difference in price. I was wrong. These reels are very smooth and seem to be very consistent in their settings, something missing in the cheaper reels. I'm going to grab another one just to make sure the first one wasn't a fluke!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: had to send the first one back because it sounded like bearings were coming apart
customer_reviews.text: So mixed reviews...had to send the first one back because it sounded like bearings were coming apart, kastking was good enough to replace it and give me some fishing line due to changing line thinking that was the problem. Got the new reel a couple wks later and new one still noisy, however will cast a country mile...just doesn't sound right. So I am very happy with customer service and trying to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: You can cast this reel without backlashes
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my 73 years I can use a bait casting set up without fear of backlashes. Adjusting the reel to the lure is easy and necessary to avoid backlash. Go on YouTube and search for videos on how to avoid backlashes. Particularly a video by Debo who uses KasKing products. Follow his instructions and practice, before long you find yourself not caring if you catch any fish you just enjoy casting with control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I normally use other brands of reels and this was my first KastKing. My first impression when I seen the reel is the quality and smoothness of the reel was a deal for this price. It casts great and once I got it tweaked the way I like it I seem to grab this rod over the others on my boat deck. If you are on the fence about this one give it a shot. It will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brokefolks

customer_reviews.title: Smooth casting, Quiet retrieve!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent reel for beginners with little to no backlash when settings are right. This is a lot of reel for the money. I own more expensive reels that do not perform to the standards of the KastKing Royale Legend. I recommend this reel for all anglers, beginners and experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: ... every weekend for a couple months and i feel like it has broken in very good and i've gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: i've used this reel quite a few times now and fishing every weekend for a couple months and i feel like it has broken in very good and i've gotten used to it to the point i feel like i can leave a review: Pros: Price Lightweight Nice foam grips Cons: construction, although this is subjective, some may prefer magnesium bodied but at the cost of weight magnetic brake system can take some getting used to. i feel like anything under 7 is birds nest city.
customer_reviews.author: Khoa V.

customer_reviews.title: Wow I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Kastking reel ever. I wanted a cheap replacement for an old daiwa reel that died. I normally go to my local outdoors retailers like Gander, BassPro, or Cabela's for all my fishing reels and rods, but not anymore. I have only had this reel for a week and have used it 4 times even in the cold rain. I love this thing. So much so that I bought a KastKing rod to go with it and went ahead and ordered a KastKing Royale Legend elite reel to replace my lew's Mach II.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The value and the smooth reeling
customer_reviews.text: Great reel right out of the box, i put it on a 7'3" duckett ghost for crank baits. If you know what you are doing and adjust the breaks right it will throw ANY size crank bait you have. Mine did not come with a cover or anything, but that is not important if it stays in the boat most of the time. I was looking for a good crank bait reel and my buddy told me about these and he wanted to try one, so i bought it ans let him use it after i tried it first of course! Then he fell in love with it and bought one also! Can not go wrong for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Kastking is second to none
customer_reviews.text: There are a number of reasons why I love Kastking products, especially their Baitcaster reels. Ease of use is foremost! It's simple to swap out lines, keep the bearings oils and to keep it clean. Moreover, their braking system is simple and lets you truly dial in and fine tune the reel to your casting style. I own one of each of their Baitcasters, a few of the "higher end competitors" as well, and I would put their up against any of the other popular brand names I currently own. Moreover, their customer service is TOP NOTCH! They earned a client for life.
customer_reviews.author: MagikTV

customer_reviews.title: Great solid baitcasting reel !
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Abu Garcia baitcasters (5500 series) for many years. This Kastking Royale Legend GT is my first new one in many years. It casts very smooth and far. With the spool tensioner and magnet controls I didn't run into any bird nests. You must make sure to adjust it for the weight of lure you're using each time. Have not had any issues. The build quality is very solid and doesn't feel like a $40 reel or any corners were cut in the manufacturing. The rubber EVA handles work great in wet conditions and provides solid grip. Hopefully this will give me many years of reliable fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not durable beyond 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good valued baitcaster. Best bang for your buck. Though after 3 years of use, the release lever broke since it’s plastic. The knobs, also plastic, are also not unscrewable even though it has a flat screwdriver groove. Lots of plastics painted to look like steel. Good reel for the short run, but not durable/dependable beyond 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: optimus_prime

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, long casting, sleek and outfitted
customer_reviews.text: Kastking is to fishing what Vizio did for TV's. Basically saying that you dont have to pay huge name prices to get an excellent reel. Super smooth long casting reel with all the bells and whistles. Love it! I would put this up against just about any reel in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: The Legend

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Fishing Reel!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best fishing reels I have ever owned! Casts great, feels good in the hand, very smooth..... a Great Reel at a Great Price! I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Went fishing with this reel, and it exceeded my expectations. Was greatly surprised at the cast ability and magnetic brake control. My only draw back was it asked to remove the spool prior to filling with line. Directions were a little spotty, and I never got the side panel to completely clear the spool. I just did it old school way and threaded line onto spool with a small pick and tied it to the spool. Will buy more in the future, now just finding more fishing time is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment to have in your arsenal. Also a great learning point for those anglers who are new to baitcasting. Set the tension high enough the your rig barely falls down to the ground and slowly back out the tension when you feel comfortable with each cast. Accuracy over distance.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Long

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, broke down quickly
customer_reviews.text: First ever bait caster... after watching tutorials and hours and hours of practicing I finally got it doing ok. After 3 hours of trying it in fishing the brakes failed multiple times and was making a weird noise so I returned.. was a shame was a sharp looking reel
customer_reviews.author: Tj Smith

customer_reviews.title: it is a great product! Mine has the rubberized cork handle grips ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd KastKing reel and as I expected, it is a great product! Mine has the rubberized cork handle grips and it's a beauty on my John Coo rod. (Amazon) I have it spooled with 12lb braid and I tied into a fighter while crappie fishing. Spun the star drag and finally brought up a 4' gar. No problem!
customer_reviews.author: Zigarro

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for first time baitcaster users
customer_reviews.text: I've used spinning reels my whole life and never understood why you would want to deal with the extra headache of a baitcaster. Turns out not really much of a headache at all. Get the brakes set right (very easy with this reel) and casting this thing is a breeze. I can cast farther and more accurate than I ever could with a spinning reel. Amazing reel for such a low price. I've never tried a $200 baitcaster to compare it to but this one casts great and reels in the big ones just fine, so why would I?
customer_reviews.author: G. Morford

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Kastking reel. (I also have the Stealth) They are terrific reels for the money. The Whitemax is smooth, powerful and quality. Fished with it for the first time yesterday and caught a monster bass. We'll see how it holds up, but my Stealth has been great so far, I expect the same from the Whitemax
customer_reviews.author: JM76

customer_reviews.title: Tensioner knob does absolutely nothing
customer_reviews.text: Tensioner knob does absolutely nothing.... Ordered another one and will send this back when I receive the replacement..... I hate the fact I lined the real and brought it out and then realized the thing diddnt work..... Can't dial in the lure weight.... Knob. Is all the way tight and lure just drops to the floor..... I use many baitcasters... There must be a piece missing...... Wasted line..... Not happy
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$........
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to write this review. I like the reel. Been using it for several months. Much better than every "low price, entry level" baitcasters I have unfortunately tried. I fish a lot and have several outfits. This one has been in my hand more than most lately. 4 of 5 stars.....needed to lube it after the first use. Slight whirling in the gears even now. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hyco Bass

customer_reviews.title: First Baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: Loved my baitcaster. First day out of the box threw 12lb mono and took it out to a pond to test it our and practice. I did look up some tips on how to use a baitcaster on YouTube which was a great help. By the time I was done I had casted about 80 times and only bird nested twice. I definitely a major fan of baitcasters and Kast King now. I wish I could say I caught something, but it was mid afternoon and almost 80 degrees out. Not the most ideal temp and time. Really looking forward to the next outing. The reel is extremely light weight and super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Helped me learn baitcasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel to learn baitcasting, not wanting to invest a ton. The quality of this reel has helped me learn without limitations (and with all the usual backlashes any beginner goes through). I’ve caught 20 bass on this since. No reason to upgrade anytime soon, it has performed well when tuned right. No problem giving this reel five stars!
customer_reviews.author: shan shan jiang

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This was junk. Lightweight nice real action but the adjustment just never seemed right. Line kept tangling on cast and eventually the line drag adjustment quit working and offered no drag no matter what adjustment you used. Lasted me 2 months with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Porter

customer_reviews.title: Royals Legend. Great budget reel!
customer_reviews.text: Great budget reel. If you want something nicer then go ahead and spend the money but if you are looking for something with a lower cost but with the features of some higher end reels this is for you. I am still testing mine but thus far it has performed well. Cast easily and far. Drag, tension, and brake adjust easily. Audible clicks for adjustments which I am a fan of. The retrieve is very smooth and the advertised gear ratios appear to be accurate. A lot of people talk trash about these reels but I have yet to see what the fuss is about.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Cooke

customer_reviews.title: ... for over 45 years I have learned from the best my father he is a very precise fisherman and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well although these are the first baitcasting reels I've ever worked with and I have been fishing for over 45 years I have learned from the best my father he is a very precise fisherman and these reels meet all of the expectations that he has instilled in me very impressed now that I am older I'm sure I will see this real to be used for many years to come very well-built Royal Legend exactly that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has quickly become my second favorite baitcaster behind a much more expensive reel
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this real for about four months. Absolutely zero problems, it is smooth and reliable so far. It has quickly become my second favorite baitcaster behind a much more expensive reel. I have no complaints. It casts great, is easy to adjust, the finish seems durable and it is a nice looking piece. I would definitely buy another should the need arise. Great real for the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: crimedog

customer_reviews.title: Biased Kastking Fanboy
customer_reviews.text: I own the Whitemax & Stealth. I love Kastking reels because the quality and price can't be beat! These reels easily compete with other brands who sell their reels for hundreds of $$$. The Whitemax is heavier (7.5 oz) but I found the perfect match for it with a 4.2 oz 6'6" M/M Diawa. This slow geared reel is great for cranks, spinners & topwater baits. Basically anything you want to move slow while in the strike zone.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Holiday's lil brotha

customer_reviews.title: Was ok while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was a decent reel until this happened while casting! Fortunately I was able to catch some fish before the handle decided to come off all on its own! There was no indication that this was going to happen. Nothing was loose, but....
customer_reviews.author: HenryK.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, more than decent drag performance
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly shocked at the level of performance from this thing. Light,sturdy, more than decent drag performance. Cast controls are a little sub-par compared to and of the Quantums that I have, but I was able to quickly dial it in and used it all last season for pitching jigs on braid (KastKing braid and I haven't had any issues with that either) and no issues with it at all. Only used for one season so far so no testimony as to durability but so far so good. Probably would be out-performed by some of the obvious higher end reels out there, but for 40 bucks, cannot be beat. I will be picking up another this season.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nelligan

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these and decided to try something new, boy this thing is hard to throw. Im definitely no pro but im not a novice and If you have never bought one before then good luck because you might just have a birds nest after your first cast. Good product and would probably get another but if you are new at using this type of reel, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel! At ANY price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Smooth, easy to adjust and good looking! I hear people say, "It is a good reel for the price..." I say it is just a great reel, period! I own many reels that are priced way above this one. The Kastking stands shoulder to shoulder to any of these. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Sweet spot in left hand bait casters
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a return, but I got it for $28. I think it will clean up just fine but I would like to have the adjustment tool that comes with it. Clutch feels good, drag feels good, spool spins good, handle is 4" or more, finish is glossy which I don't like. Looking to buy the $90. High speed reel they make when it goes on sale. A BARGAIN @$28.
customer_reviews.author: Daxenoz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set and adjust, feels solid, never skips a beat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Kastking reel about a year ago, I now own 6! I Bass fish heavily, and in a lot of cover and situations, and bar none.....this line of reels competes with the best of them. If your looking for something new, give them a shot, you WILL not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Compact quality
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I can confirm quality of construction. In the past I've purchased and used many cheap spin-cast reels; this reel has that quiet smoothness you hope to get in a reel like this. It produces the results I most want. I purchased this because of overall satisfaction with previous KastKing reels.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Third times the charm! Let’s go fishing!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three of these reals! I ordered right handed. The first two were left handed so I couldn’t use them! Third times the charm! I’m not sure what to do with the first two seems like a lot of trouble to return! They do look nicely made feel good and smooth! I’ll let y’all know how they work on a follow up! Just to be fair I have not contacted the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great reel
customer_reviews.text: with both centrifugal and magnetic drags this reel is great for beginners! my daughter took to mine very quickly with very few backlashes. seems to be well made, i might have to get one or two more if i can slide it past the wife!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with kastking!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second kastking reel I have purchased, the first being the speed demon. I am very impressed with these reels. I have several big name brand and I believe these are as good or better. I know on casting distance these are great! I think kastking will make a big impact on fishing with their new equipment. I will definately purchase more products. Great job on product and price Kastking!
customer_reviews.author: james smith

customer_reviews.title: Was excited to get it and certainly disappointed that it was defective straight from the factory
customer_reviews.text: Reel came in defective right out of the box. First thing I wanted to look at it was the braking system and the cover would not come off. Talk to customer service and they are sending me a return label so they can send me a replacement. Hope this will not be the same issue next time. Was excited to get it and certainly disappointed that it was defective straight from the factory. Obviously some problem with quality control...
customer_reviews.author: John Rist

customer_reviews.title: Backlash King. Revised to bait casting King.
customer_reviews.text: Can't afford this reel. I have spent more on line trying to set it up to throw Senko floaters just on backlashes that I can only cut off. EDIT.. there were adjustments I was unaware of. Everything is now smooth as silk and I also bought a Centron spinning combo and spooled both with KastKing braid. I love them both. .
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie McCurry

customer_reviews.title: casts great
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand and casts great. I married it to an esport rod. It is a cheap rod of higher quality with excellent reviews. Anyway, i only had 2 backlashes the whole evening which were my fault because i have not thrown a baitcaster in a long time. This reel is SMOOTH! It preformed as expected and i am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zosma

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Bass
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical like most avid fishermen about the quality I was going to receive in this reel. To be honest it performs just as well as some of my more expensive reels costing 3 times more. Easy to tune for whichever lure you're throwing also. I highly recommend Kastking products.
customer_reviews.author: VinceHollaway

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've fished for a long time. I've had a variety of bait casting reels, mostly Shimanos. I was pleasantly surprised at the smoothness, and castability of the reel. Loaded it with 10 lb mono, tied on a topwater, took it to my lake and by the third cast, I was getting impressive distance, and no backlash. It's a keeper in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kennedy

product_meta.title: KastKing Royale Legend GT Baitcasting Reels, New Low Profile Design Fishing Reel, Magnet Braking System, 17.6 Lbs Carbon Fiber Drag, 5+1 Shielded Stainless Steel Bearings
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR BEGINNERS – The 1st Generation Royal legend baitcasting reel has one of the best dual brake systems with a quick, easy to fine-tune reliable centrifugal and magnetic brake system for superior casting control. If you are new to baitcasters or get frustrated with backlashes, the Royale Legend is the perfect choice.
BIGGER LINE CAPACITY – Royale Legend I is a bigger baitcasting reel than the 2nd generation. It’s a good fit when you need to have more lines on your reel.

PERFORMANCE - Low profile design bait caster with a super silent high speed 7.0:1 line retrieve. Two color anodized aluminum forged multi-ported whiffle-style spool offers maximum strength while reducing weight.
UNMATCHED – Precision cut brass gear structure and carbon fiber drag system delivering 17.5 LBs of drag offer the ultimate in a high performance low maintenance baitcasting reel package.
PROVEN - 11 + 1 double shielded MaxiDur ball bearings for super smooth casting, retrieve, and long life.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
